text: Below is an instruction that describes a question about a UX research method ### Instruction: Suggest the right UX research method ### Input: I have an idea for an app or product. ### Response: The right UX research method are surveys or user interviews.

Below is an instruction that describes a question about a UX research method ### Instruction: Suggest the right UX research method ### Input: I have an app an in development ### Response: The right UX research method are UX tests for low- or medium-fidelity prototypes.

Below is an instruction that describes a question about a UX research method ### Instruction: Suggest the right UX research method ### Input: My app is already on the market and has users ### Response: The right UX research method are A/B-Tests.
